title: Lembani Mawu/Kanema
unsupportedFileType: Mtundu wa fayilo wosathandizidwa. Chonde sankhani fayilo ya mawu kapena kanema.
rateLimitExceededWaiting: Malire a kuyesera apitilira. Kudikira masekondi {seconds} musanayesenso...
uploadAudioVideoFile: Kwezani fayilo ya mawu kapena kanema
transcriptionComplete: Kulemba kwatheka! Mawu awonjezedwa ku malo olowetsera kucheza.
This is a set of instructions that guide: Izi ndi malangizo omwe amatsogolera AI Assistant mmene angayankhire. Zimathandiza AI kupereka zambiri zothandiza ndi zolondola popereka nkhani ku mafunso ofunsidwa.
Enter a prompt or type \"/\" to select a: Lowetsani lamulo kapena lembani "/" kuti musankhe lamulo...
Add your personal instructions to custom: Onjezani malangizo anu kuti musinthe mmene AI imayankhira. Izi zimaphatikizidwa ndi malangizo a khalidwe loyenera omwe amatitsimikizira mayankho othandiza, olondola, ndi otetezedwa.
Tip: Type \"/\" to select from saved pro: Uphungu: Lembani "/" kuti musankhe kuchokera ku malamulo osungidwa.
Higher values produce more creative and: Zikhalidwe zapamwamba zimapanga mayankho olengedwa kwambiri ndi osiyanasiyana, zikhalidwe zotsika zimathandiza kufocused ndi zotsimikizika.
Zikhalidwe zapamwamba zimapanga mayankho olengedwa kwambiri ndi osiyanasiyana, zikhalidwe zotsika zimathandiza kufocused ndi zotsimikizika.
*Note that these default settings only a: *Dziwani kuti zikhazikiko zoyamba izi zimagwira ntchito pa zokambirana zatsopano zokha zikasungidwa.
Storage usage is normal: Kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka malo osunga ndi kabwino
Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Sakeni nambala iyi ya QR ndi foni yanu kuti muyambe kuyika
Access the app directly from your home s: Fikirni pulogalamu mwachindunji kuchokera pa skrini yanu yakunyumba
Works offline with cached conversations: Imagwira ntchito popanda intaneti ndi zokambirana zosungidwa
PWA Safari Warning: Kofunika: Muyenera kugwiritsa ntchito msakatuli wa Safari. Msakatuli ena monga Chrome kapena Firefox sangagwire ntchito kuyika pa iOS.
PWA Install Tip: Uphungu: Yikani mutalowalowa kuti musunge kutsimikizira kwanu ndi kukhala ndi ntchito yabwino.
PWA Note: Dziwani: Izi zimayika pulogalamu ya pa intaneti ngati Progressive Web App (PWA) pa chipangizo chanu. Sitolo ya pulogalamu sikufunika!
Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Phunzirani zambiri zokhudza Progressive Web Apps
Storage almost full! Consider clearing o: Malo osunga atsala pang'ono kudzala! Lingalirani kuchotsa zokambirana zakale
Storage usage is getting high: Kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka malo osunga kukukwera

agents.formatDescription: Mtundu: asst_xxxxx (kuchokera ku MSF AI Assistant Foundry)
agents.importantInfo: Ejansi iyi idzakhala ndi mwayi woona zokambirana ndipo idzatha kugwiritsa ntchito zida zomwe zili ngati mitundu wamba. Onetsetsani kuti ID ya Ejansi ndi yolondola chifukwa siingasinthidwe pambuyo pake.
agents.defunctWarning: Mtundu woyambirira wa ejansi iyi sakupezeka. Sinthani ejansi kuti musankhe mtundu watsopano, kapena ichotseni.
agents.importFileDescription: Sankhani fayilo ya JSON yokhala ndi ejansi imodzi kapena zambiri
agents.invalidIdFormat: Mtundu wa ID ya ejansi wosavomerezeka. Mtundu woyembekezedwa: asst_xxxxx
agents.noAgentsInFile: Palibe ma-ejansi apezeka mu fayilo yolowetsedwa

Type / in chat to access your prompts: Lembani / mu kucheza kuti mupeze malamulo anu
Type / in chat, select your prompt, and: Lembani / mu kucheza, sankhani lamulo lanu, ndipo dzazani zosinthika mukafunsidwa
Sentence length, complexity, active vs p: Kutalika kwa chiganizo, kusavutika, mawu odziwitsa kapena odziwitsidwa
Apply tones in chat via Expand Actions t: Gwiritsani ntchito mawu mu kucheza kudzera mu Kwezani Zochitika kuti mutsimikizire kuti mayankho onse akugwirizana ndi mawu omwe mukufuna

tones_conflict_message: Mawu {count} omwe ali ndi mayina ofanana alipo kale: {names}. Kodi mulowetse?
FAQs, privacy policy, and guides: FAQ, ndondomeko ya chinsinsi, ndi malangizo

Control Your Voice with Custom Tones: Yang'anirani Mawu Anu ndi Mawu Apadera
Create voice profiles for consistent wri: Pangani mbiri za mawu kuti mulembe mogwirizana
Delete template and all its items: Chotsani lamulo ndi zinthu zake zonse
importBackupParseError: Kulephera kuwerenga fayilo yosungidwa. Chonde onetsetsani kuti ndi JSON yovomerezeka.
Please select at least one item type to: Chonde sankhani mtundu wa chinthu chimodzi osachepera kutulutsa
Preferred words, phrases to use or avoid: Mawu ndi mawu omwe mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito kapena kupewa

Turn your repetitive tasks into one-clic: Sinthani ntchito zanu zobwerezabwereza kukhala malamulo a kudina kamodzi

errorFailedToFetchUrl: Kulephera kutenga zomwe zili pa URL
errorOccurredFetchingUrl: Panali cholakwika potenga zomwe zili pa URL
Please upload some content or describe t: Chonde kwezani zomwe zili kapena fotokozani mawu omwe mukufuna
Please enter prompt content first: Chonde lowetsani zomwe zili mu lamulo poyamba
Please provide either a description or g: Chonde perekani kufotokozera kapena cholinga chopangira lamulo
noTonesAvailable:
Palibe mawu opezeka.

Pangani mawu mu Zochitika Mwachangu kuti muyang'anire kalemba, mwamwambo, ndi umunthu.
applyCustomVoiceProfile:
Gwiritsani ntchito mbiri ya mawu apadera pa mauthenga anu.

Sankhani mawu kuti muyang'anire kalemba, mwamwambo, ndi umunthu.

Imakhalabe mpaka itasinthidwa kapena kuchotsedwa.

enterExamplesPlaceholder: Perekani mawu achitsanzo omwe amasonyeza mawu awa

welcomeV2.title: Takulandirani ku AI Assistant V2

webSearch.title: Njira ya Kusakira pa Intaneti
webSearch.description: Patsani AI mwayi wosakirira pa intaneti nthawi yeniyeni ndi zosankha zotetezedwa
webSearch.quickAccessInstructions: Dinani batani ya + pafupi ndi malo olowetsera kucheza → Sankhani "Kusakira pa Intaneti"
webSearch.setAsDefaultInstructions: Tsegulani zikhazikiko za mtundu ndikuyatsa Njira ya Kusakira pa Intaneti. Sankhani pakati pa:
webSearch.azureAIFoundryDescription: Yachangu, koma kukambirana konse kusungidwa kunja

tones.title: Mawu (Mbiri za Mawu)
tones.description: Yang'anirani kalemba wa AI, mwamwambo, ndi umunthu
tones.createTonesInstructions: Zochitika Mwachangu mu gawo lakumbali → Tab ya Mawu
tones.useTonesInstructions: Dinani pa mawu pafupi ndi malo olowetsera kucheza

aiAssist.title: AI Yothandiza pa Malamulo ndi Mawu
aiAssist.description: Lolani AI ikuthandizeni kupanga malamulo ndi mawu abwino mwachangu
aiAssist.step1: Tsegulani Zochitika Mwachangu mu gawo lakumbali
aiAssist.getSuggestionsDesc: AI imawunikira zomwe mwalemba ndikupereka zokonza
aiAssist.testBeforeSavingDesc: Yesani malamulo/mawu mu chionetsero cha kucheza chenicheni

customAgents.title: Ma-ejansi Apadera
customAgents.description: Ma-ejansi a AI apadera okhala ndi maudindo owonjezera monga kusakira pa intaneti ndi kutanthauzira nambala
customAgents.advancedFeatureDesc: Ma-ejansi Apadera amagwira ntchito pa Azure AI Foundry ndi zida zapadera. Zimafunikira kugwirizana ndi gulu laukatswiri la AI Assistant kuti apange ma-ID a ejansi.
customAgents.configureAgents: Konzani ma-ejansi okhala ndi maudindo apadera
customAgents.selectFromDropdown: Sankhani ma-ejansi apadera kuchokera ku mndandanda wa mitundu

audioTranslation.title: Kulemba Mawu ndi Kumasulira
audioTranslation.description: Masulani modzidzimutsa zolemba za mawu ku zilankhulo 13+
audioTranslation.step1: Kwezani fayilo ya mawu kapena kanema
audioTranslation.step2: Dinani pa mndandanda wa chilankhulo mu malo olemba

languageSupport.title: Zilankhulo 54 Zothandizidwa
languageSupport.description: Tsopano zikupezeka mu zilankhulo 54 kuti magulu ambiri a MSF ndi anthu a m'madera athe kugwiritsa ntchito AI Assistant m'chilankhulo chawo
languageSupport.autoDetect: Chilankhulo chanu chimazindikiridwa modzidzimutsa kuchokera ku zikhazikiko za msakatuli wanu
languageSupport.manualSwitch: Sinthani nthawi iliyonse kudzera mu wosankha chilankhulo mu gawo lakumbali

pwa.title: Yikani ngati Pulogalamu ya Foni
pwa.description: Progressive Web App yokhala ndi ntchito yeniyeni
pwa.installTip: Uphungu: Yikani mutalowalowa kuti musunge kutsimikizira kwanu ndi kukhala ndi ntchito yabwino.
pwa.step2: Tsegulani Zikhazikiko → Pulogalamu ya Foni kuti muone malangizo onse
pwa.step3: Pa foni: Dinani menyu ya msakatuli
pwa.step4: Sakani "Onjezani ku Skrini Yakunyumba" kapena "Yikani Pulogalamu"
pwa.benefit1: Yambitsani ngati pulogalamu yeniyeni kuchokera pa skrini yakunyumba
pwa.benefit2: Skrini yonse popanda maonekedwe a msakatuli

terms.aiTranslationNotice: Uku ndi kumasulira kwa AI komwe kwaperekedwa kukuthandizani kumvetsa masomphenya. Masomphenya omangira mwalamulo akupezeka mu Chingerezi ndi Chifalansa kokha.

auth.signInWithMsfAccount: Lowani ndi akaunti yanu ya msf.org
auth.accessLimitedText: Pakadali pano MSF AI Assistant akupezeka kwa ogwira ntchito a ku USA, Amsterdam, ndi Geneva okha.
auth.errorConfiguration: Pali vuto ndi zokhazikitsa za seva.
auth.errorVerification: Chizindikiro cha kutsimikizira chatheratu kapena chagwiritsidwa kale ntchito.
auth.errorConfigurationServer: Pali vuto ndi zokhazikitsa za seva yotsimikizira.
auth.errorAccessDeniedPermissions: Mwayi wakanidwa. Chonde onani zilolezo zanu.
auth.errorOAuthSignin: Sikunatheke kulumikizana ndi ntchito yotsimikizira. Chonde yesaninso.
auth.errorOAuthCreateAccount: Sikunatheke kupanga akaunti. Chonde lumikizanani ndi chithandizo.
auth.errorEmailCreateAccount: Sikunatheke kupanga akaunti. Chonde lumikizanani ndi chithandizo.
auth.errorCallback: Kubwerera kwa kutsimikizira kwalephera. Chonde yesaninso.
auth.errorOAuthAccountNotLinked: Akaunti iyi yalumikizidwa kale ndi wogwiritsa ntchito wina.
auth.errorCredentialsSignin: Kulowa kwalephera. Chonde onani zomwe mwalowetsa.
auth.errorSessionRequired: Chonde lowani kuti mupeze tsamba ili.
auth.errorSessionExpired: Nthawi yanu yatha. Chonde lowani kuti mupitirize.
auth.errorFallback: Sikunatheke kulumikizana ndi ntchito yotsimikizira. Chonde yesaninso kapena lumikizanani ndi chithandizo ngati vutoli likupitirira.
auth.errorCookiesCleared: Deta ya gawo la ntchito yachotsedwa chifukwa cha malire a posungira. Chonde lowaninso.
auth.errorHeadersTooLarge: Deta ya gawo la ntchito ndi yayikulu kwambiri. Chonde lowaninso.

contact.title: Lumikizanani ndi Zipangizo
contact.description: Lumikizanani ndi gulu lathu ndipo fikirani maulalo othandiza

contact.requestDescription: Mukufuna thandizo kapena mukufuna kupereka maganizo? Dinani pansipa kuti mutsegule fomu yathu ya chithandizo.
contact.emailDescription: Titumizireni imelo pa mafunso, maganizo, kapena mavuto a ukatswiri

resources.title: Zipangizo Zowonjezera
resources.portalDescription: Zolemba, zosintha za pulojekiti, ndi zida zophunzitsira
resources.githubDescription: Onani nambala, fotokozani mavuto, ndi kuthandizira pa GitHub

support.organizationDescription: Sankhani bungwe lanu la MSF kuti muone malo oyenera a chithandizo
support.emailDescription: Lumikizanani ndi gulu la chithandizo la {organization}
support.escalationTitle: Ogwira Ntchito a MSF Akutchire ndi Ena
support.escalationDescription: Tsatirani njira ya chithandizo cha IT ya bungwe lanu
support.escalationShort: Lumikizanani ndi chithandizo cha IT chapafupi
support.escalationStep1: Lumikizanani ndi chithandizo cha IT chapafupi poyamba
support.escalationStep2: Ngati sichinathetse, kwezani ku dipatimenti ya IT ya Operational Center (OC) yanu
support.escalationStep3: Ngati sikuchinathetse, IT ya OC itha kukweza ku SITS (Shared IT Services)

settings.Model Response Settings Description: Konzani zikhazikiko zoyamba za mayankho a mtundu wa AI. Mitundu yosiyanasiyana imagwiritsa ntchito zikhazikiko zosiyanasiyana.
settings.reasoningEffortDescription: Kuyang'anira kuya kwa kuganiza kwa mitundu yoganizira. Kulimbikira kwambiri kumapanga kafukufuku wathunthu.
settings.verbosityDescription: Kuyang'anira mlingo wa zambiri za mayankho a mitundu ya GPT-5.
settings.Controls how smoothly text appears durin: Kuyang'anira mmene mawu amaonekera bwino pa mayankho a AI
settings.Reset Confirmation Message: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kubwezeretsa zikhazikiko zonse? Izi zidzabwezeretsa zikhalidwe zoyamba za kutentha, mutu, ndi zokonda zina. Zokambirana zanu, malamulo, ndi mawu sadzakhudzidwa.
settings.storageAlmostFull: Malo osunga atsala pang'ono kudzala! Lingalirani kuchotsa zokambirana zakale.
settings.storageUsageHigh: Kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka malo osunga kukukwera.
settings.storageUsageNormal: Kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka malo osunga ndi kabwino
settings.backupDescription: Pangani chosungira chathunthu cha deta yanu yonse kuphatikiza zokambirana, malamulo, mawu, mafoda, ndi zikhazikiko.
settings.clearDataWarning: Chotsani mbiri yonse ya zokambirana kuchoka ku malo osunga apafupi. Izi sizingabwezeretsedwe.
settings.teamTemplatesDescription: Pangani phukusi la malamulo anu, mawu, mafoda, ndi ma-ejansi apadera mu fayilo yogawana yomwe mamembala ena a gulu atha kulowetsa.
settings.Display Name Description: Sankhani mmene dzina lanu limaonekera pa moni ndi mu pulogalamu yonse
settings.displayNameUIOnly: Izi zimayang'anira mmene dzina lanu limaonekera mu pulogalamu. AI simaona izi pokhapokha mutayatsa kugawana mu Zikhazikiko za Kucheza.
settings.Scan this QR code with your mobile devic: Sakeni nambala iyi ya QR ndi foni yanu kuti muyambe kuyika
settings.Access the app directly from your home s: Fikirani pulogalamu mwachindunji kuchokera pa skrini yanu yakunyumba
settings.Works offline with cached conversations: Imagwira ntchito popanda intaneti ndi zokambirana zosungidwa
settings.PWA Safari Warning: Muyenera kugwiritsa ntchito msakatuli wa Safari pa iOS - Chrome ndi msakatuli ena samathandizira kuyika mapulogalamu a pa intaneti pa iOS.
settings.PWA Install Tip: Uphungu: Mukayika, mutha kuyambitsa pulogalamu kuchokera pa skrini yanu yakunyumba ngati pulogalamu yeniyeni - msakatuli sakufunika!
settings.PWA Note: Dziwani: Iyi ndi Progressive Web App (PWA). Imayikidwa ngati pulogalamu yeniyeni koma imagwira ntchito kudzera mu ukatswiri wa msakatuli wanu. Deta yanu yonse imakhalabe yachinsinsi ndi yotetezedwa pa chipangizo chanu.
settings.Learn more about Progressive Web Apps: Phunzirani zambiri zokhudza Progressive Web Apps
settings.FAQs, privacy policy, and guides: FAQ, ndondomeko ya chinsinsi, ndi malangizo
settings.legacyDataDescription: Muli ndi {size} ya deta yochokera ku mtundu wakale. Iyi ikhoza kusamutsidwa, kutulutsidwa, kapena kuchotsedwa kuti mutulutse malo.
settings.legacyDeleteError: Kulephera kuchotsa deta yakale. Chonde yesaninso.
settings.deleteLegacyConfirm: Kodi mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kuchotsa deta yakale yonse? Ntchito iyi singabwezeretsedwe.

aboutYou.title: Zokhudza Inu
aboutYou.shareBasicInfoDescription: Zikayatsidwa, AI idzadziwa dzina lanu, udindo, ndi dipatimenti kuchokera ku mbiri yanu
aboutYou.preferredNameDescription: Sinthani dzina lanu loonekedwa. Siyani chopanda kanthu kuti mugwiritsa ntchito dzina la mbiri yanu
aboutYou.preferredNameDescriptionWithSync: Mmene AI idzakulankhulireni. Siyani chopanda kanthu kuti mugwiritsa ntchito dzina lanu loonekedwa kuchokera ku Zikhazikiko za Wamba.
aboutYou.additionalContextPlaceholder: Mwach., Ndimagwira ntchito kutchire, ndimakonda mayankho achidule, ndimatafunsa za ndondomeko zachipatala...
aboutYou.additionalContextDescription: Zambiri zilizonse zomwe mukufuna kuti AI idziwe za inu

tts.title: Mawu-ku-Kulankhula
tts.qualityDescription: Bwino lapamwamba limapanga mawu abwino koma limagwiritsa ntchito bandwidth yambiri
tts.previewText: Ichi ndi chionetsero cha zikhazikiko za mawu zosankhidwa.
tts.noVoicesAvailable: Palibe mawu opezeka pa chilankhulo ichi

createDiagrams.title: Pangani Zithunzi
createDiagrams.prompt: Ndionetseni mmene mungathe kupanga zithunzi ndi njira zapulojekiti. Kodi ndi njira ziti, ntchito, kapena dongosolo zomwe mungandithandizire kuona? Ndipatseni zitsanzo.

draftContent.title: Lembani Zinthu Zaukadaulo
draftContent.prompt: Ndikufuna thandizo polemba zikalata zaukadaulo - maimelo, malipoti, mafotokozedwe. Kodi mungandionyeze zitsanzo za mmene mungathandizire ndi mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya kulemba kwa bizinesi?

analyzeInformation.title: Wunikirani Zambiri
analyzeInformation.prompt: Kodi mungandithandize bwanji kuwunikira deta kapena zambiri? Ndionetseni njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe mungagawire manambala, kupeza mitundu, kapena kutulutsa mfundo kuchokera mu zikalata kapena deta.

planOrganize.title: Konzani ndi Dongosolo
planOrganize.prompt: Kodi mungandithandize kukonza mapulojekiti kapena kukonza ntchito? Ndipatseni zitsanzo za mmene mungapangire nthawi, ma-ajenda, kapena mapulani a pulojekiti ndi makonzedwe osiyanasiyana.

brainstormIdeas.title: Ganizani Maganizo
brainstormIdeas.prompt: Ndikufuna kuganiza njira zothetsa vuto. Ndionetseni mmene mumafunira kuganiza mwapadera ndi kupanga maganizo - kodi ndi mafunso ati omwe mungafunse ndi mmene mumafufuzira mwayi?

buildPresentations.title: Pangani Zoonetsera
buildPresentations.prompt: Kodi mungandithandize bwanji kupanga zoonetsera? Ndionetseni zitsanzo za makonzedwe osiyanasiyana a zoonetsera, maganizo amaonekedwe, ndi mmene mumakonzera zambiri kwa anthu osiyanasiyana.

workWithCode.title: Gwiritsani Ntchito Nambala
workWithCode.prompt: Kodi mungandithandize ndi kulemba nambala kapena masikiriti? Ndionetseni zitsanzo - kaya ndi kulemba nambala yatsopano, kukonza mavuto, kapena kufotokoza mmene chinachake chimagwirira ntchito gawo ndi gawo.

decisionSupport.title: Chithandizo Chosankha
decisionSupport.prompt: Ndikufuna kupanga chisankho koma sindikudziwa mmene ndingayenereze zosankha zanga. Kodi mungandionyeze njira zosiyanasiyana kapena njira zomwe mumagwiritsa ntchito kuthandiza kuganiza za zosankha?

summarizeSynthesize.title: Fotokozani Mwachidule ndi Kuphatikiza
summarizeSynthesize.prompt: Kodi mumathandiza bwanji kufotokoza mwachidule zikalata zitali kapena kuphatikiza zambiri kuchokera ku magwero osiyanasiyana? Ndionetseni zitsanzo za mitundu yosiyanasiyana ya mafotokozedwe achidule ndi milingo ya zambiri.

explainTopics.title: Fotokozani Mitu Yovuta
explainTopics.prompt: Kodi mutha kufotokoza zinthu zovuta mu mawu osavuta? Ndionetseni mmene mumawonongera maganizo ovuta, kugwiritsa ntchito mafanizo, ndi kusintha mafotokozedwe pa milingo yosiyanasiyana ya kudziwa.

createSchedules.title: Pangani Mapulani a Nthawi
createSchedules.prompt: Ndikufuna thandizo kukonza nthawi ndi kupanga mapulani. Ndionetseni njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe mungakonzere ma-ajenda, makalenda, kapena mapulani opangidwa pa nthawi ndi zitsanzo.

agents.description: Pangani ndi kuyang'anira ma-ejansi a AI apadera okhala ndi maudindo apadera. Ma-ejansi awa amagwira ntchito pa MSF AI Assistant Foundry.
agents.advancedFeatureTitle: Chinthu Chapamwamba - Chimafunikira Kugwirizana ndi Gulu Laukatswiri la AI Assistant
agents.advancedFeatureWarning: Ma-ejansi apadera amagwira ntchito ndi MSF AI Assistant Foundry yokha. Ma-ID a ejansi ayenera kupangidwa ndi gulu laukatswiri la AI Assistant pa malo apadera ndi kugwirizanitsidwa ndi inu musanagwiritsa ntchito.
agents.noAgentsDescription: Pangani ejansi yanu yoyamba yapadera kuti mukulitse maudindo a AI ndi zida ndi makhalidwe apadera.

advancedOptions.title: Zosankha Zapamwamba
advancedOptions.fixedTemperatureNote: Dziwani: Mtundu uwu umagwiritsa ntchito zikhalidwe za kutentha zokhazikika kuti ugwire ntchito mogwirizana.

searchMode.title: Njira ya Kusakira
searchMode.subtitle: Idzagwiritsa ntchito kusakira pa intaneti pakafunika
searchMode.azureAgentModeDescription: Yachangu koma imasunga deta ya zokambirana pa mtambo
searchMode.privacyInfoDescription: Kukambirana kwanu konse kudzatumizidwa kwa Azure AI Foundry agent.

customAgent.label: Ejansi Yapadera:
customAgent.description: Ejansi iyi imagwira ntchito pa MSF AI Assistant Foundry ndi zida zoyatsidwa nthawi zonse.

modelTypeIcons.omni: Mtundu wa mitundu yambiri wokhala ndi maudindo akuluakulu
modelTypeIcons.agent: Ejansi yokhala ndi zida za nthawi yeniyeni ndi mwayi wa intaneti

gpt_4_1.name: GPT-4.1
gpt_4_1.description: Mtundu wa AI woyendetsedwa ndi GPT-4.1 wokhala ndi kusakira pa intaneti nthawi yeniyeni kudzera pa Bing. Imapereka zambiri zaposachedwa, kutsimikizira zoonadi, ndi kudziwa za zochitika zaposachedwa. Yabwino kwambiri pa kafukufuku wofunikira zambiri zaposachedwa, kuwunikira nkhani, ndi kutsimikizira zoonadi.

gpt_5_2.name: GPT-5.2
gpt_5_2.description: Mtundu wapamwamba kwambiri wa OpenAI, womwe umapambana pa kuganiza kovuta, kupanga nambala, ndi kuthetsa mavuto aukatswiri. Wabwino kwambiri pa ntchito zowunikira, zovuta za kulemba nambala, kafukufuku, ndi mafotokozedwe athunthu. Umathandizira kulimbikira kwa kuganiza kosinthika ndi kutalikira kwa mayankho.

gpt_5_mini.name: GPT-5 Mini
gpt_5_mini.description: Mtundu wachangu kwambiri ndi wotchipa wa GPT-5, wokonzedwa kuti ukhale wachangu pomwe umapitiriza kukhala wabwino. Wabwino pa ntchito za tsiku ndi tsiku, mafunso achangu, ndi mapulogalamu omwe amafunikira mayankho achangu. Kulingana kwabwino kwa ntchito ndi kuthekera.

gpt_5_2_chat.name: GPT-5.2 Chat
gpt_5_2_chat.description: Mtundu wapadera wa GPT-5.2 wokonzedwa pa kukambirana ndi kudziwa maganizo. Umapambana pa kulankhula momvera, chithandizo cha umoyo wamaganizo, kulemba mwapadera, kuganiza maganizo, ndi kukambirana kwachibadwidwe. Wabwino pa zokambirana zachibale, makhalidwe a uphungu, ndi ntchito zofunikira kudziwa maganizo.

o3.name: o3
o3.description: Mtundu wa kuganiza wapamwamba kwambiri wa OpenAI wokhala ndi maudindo othetsa mavuto apamwamba. Umapambana pa masamu ovuta, kuganiza kwasayansi, zovuta za kulemba nambala, ndi ntchito za kuganiza zamaphatikizidwe ambiri. Zenera lokulitsidwa la 200K. Umathandizira kuyang'anira kulimbikira kwa kuganiza.

llama_4_maverick.name: Llama 4 Maverick
llama_4_maverick.description: Mtundu wachangu ndi wotchipa kuchokera ku Meta. Wabwino pa ntchito za tsiku ndi tsiku monga kulemba, kufotokoza mwachidule, ndi thandizo loyambirira la kulemba nambala. Kulingana kwabwino kwa liwiro ndi bwino pa ntchito za tsiku ndi tsiku.

deepseek_r1.name: DeepSeek-R1
deepseek_r1.description: Katswiri wa kuganiza amene amaonetsera ntchito yake gawo ndi gawo. Wabwino kwambiri pa mavuto a masamu, mikuluwiko ya kuganiza, ndi kumvetsa maganizo ovuta. Onani mmene amaganizira pa mavuto nthawi yeniyeni.

deepseek_v3_1.name: DeepSeek-V3.1
deepseek_v3_1.description: Mtundu wamphamvu pa zonse makamaka pa kulemba nambala ndi kulemba kwaukatswiri. Wabwino pa kukonza nambala, kulemba zolemba, ndi kufotokoza maganizo aukatswiri. Wachangu ndi wokhulupilika pa ntchito za kupanga.

grok_3.name: Grok 3
grok_3.description: Mtundu wothandiza kuchokera ku xAI wodziwika ndi mayankho athunthu. Wabwino pa zokambirana zopanda malire, ntchito zapadera, ndi kuthetsa mavuto ovuta.

claude_opus_4_5.name: Claude Opus 4.5
claude_opus_4_5.description: Mtundu wa Anthropic wotha kwambiri wokhala ndi kuganiza kwapamwamba, kulemba nambala, ndi maudindo apadera. Wabwino kwambiri pa kafukufuku wovuta, kafukufuku, ndi ntchito zofunikira kumvetsa mozama.

claude_sonnet_4_5.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
claude_sonnet_4_5.description: Mtundu wa Claude wolingana womwe umapereka ntchito yabwino pa kulemba nambala, kuwunikira, ndi ntchito zapadera. Wabwino pa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka tsiku ndi tsiku ndi nthawi yachangu ya mayankho.

claude_opus_4_1.name: Claude Opus 4.1
claude_opus_4_1.description: Mtundu wa Claude Opus wa mbadwo wapita. Wabwino kwambiri pa ntchito zovuta za kulemba nambala, kafukufuku wathunthu, ndi kumvetsa kwathunthu.

claude_haiku_4_5.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
claude_haiku_4_5.description: Mtundu wa Claude wachangu ndi wotchipa wokonzedwa pa ntchito zachangu. Wabwino pa mafunso osavuta, kufotokoza mwachidule, ndi mapulogalamu ambiri.

searchMode.title: Njira ya Kusakira Yofotokozedwa
searchMode.subtitle: Kumvetsa zosankha zanu zosakirira ndi kumene deta yanu imasungidwa
searchMode.noSearchDescription: Mayankho achangu kwambiri popanda mwayi wosakirira pa intaneti. Kukambirana kwanu konse kumakhalabe mu msakatuli wanu - palibe zomwe zimasungidwa pa mtambo.
searchMode.viewDetailsBelow: Kuti muone zambiri, onani njira ya ukatswiri pansipa.
searchMode.viewTechnicalFlowDiagram: Onani Chithunzi cha Njira ya Ukatswiri
searchMode.legendNoSearch: Msakatuli Wanu (malo osunga apafupi) | Seva ya AI Assistant | Azure OpenAI (popanda nkhani)
searchMode.privacyDescription: Imagwiritsa ntchito kusakira pa intaneti pakafunika koma imachedwa chifukwa maphatikizidwe ambiri amaphatikizidwa. Mafunso osakiridwa okha amasungidwa mu Azure - kukambirana kwanu konse kumakhalabe mu msakatuli wanu.
searchMode.legendPrivacy: Msakatuli Wanu (malo osunga apafupi) | Seva ya AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry (mafunso osakiridwa okha) | Azure OpenAI (popanda nkhani)
searchMode.foundryDescription: Mayankho achangu okhala ndi mwayi wosakirira pa intaneti womangidwa mkati. Kukambirana kwanu konse kumasungidwa mu deta ya Azure AI Foundry, osati mu msakatuli wanu yokha.
searchMode.legendFoundry: Msakatuli Wanu (malo osunga apafupi) | Seva ya AI Assistant | Azure AI Foundry Agent (imasunga kukambirana konse)
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText1: Izi ndi njira zosakirira zopezeka pambuyo pake Azure itachotsa API yawo ya Bing Search, yomwe AI Assistant ankadalira poyamba.
searchMode.whyTheseOptionsText2: Gululo likufufuza mwamphamvu njira zosakirira zotetezedwa chinsinsi. Zosankha zonse ziwiri zimagwiritsa ntchito maudindo osakirira a Azure AI Foundry koma zimasiyana pa deta yochuluka ya kukambirana yomwe imagawidwa.
searchMode.azureDeprecatedBingApi: Azure anachotsa API yawo ya Bing Search
searchMode.footerNote: Njira zonse ziwiri zimasunga kukambirana kwanu pa chipangizo chanu. Mutha kusintha njira nthawi iliyonse mu zikhazikiko za mtundu.

descriptions.foundLegacyData: Tapeza deta kuchokera ku mtundu wakale. Kodi mukufuna kuisamutsa kuti igwire ntchito ndi dongosolo lokonzedwanso?
descriptions.storageSpaceWarning: Deta yanu imafunikira malo ambiri kuposa omwe alipo. Tikukulimbikitsani kugwiritsa ntchito njira yokhazikika yocheperako.
descriptions.pleaseWait: Chonde dikirani pomwe tikukonza deta yanu...
descriptions.dataIsSafe: Deta yanu yoyambirira ili bwino. Mutha kuyesanso kapena kudumpha pakadali pano.
descriptions.itemsTooLarge: Zinthu izi ndi zazikulu kwambiri kuti zilowe mu malo osunga. Mutha kuzitulutsa, kutulutsa malo, kapena kupitirira popanda izo.

message.warning: Malo osunga a msakatuli wanu ali pa {percent}%.
message.critical: Malo osunga a msakatuli wanu ali pansi kwambiri pa {percent}%.
message.emergency: Malo osunga a msakatuli wanu atsala pang'ono kudzala pa {percent}%!

storageWarning.consequence: Ngati malo osunga adzala, mutha kutaya mwayi wopeza zokambirana zatsopano ndipo pulogalamu ikhoza kusiya kugwira ntchito bwino.

confirm.title: Tsimikizani Kuchotsa
confirm.message: Izi zidzachotsa kosabwezeretseka zokambirana {count}. Izi sizingabwezeretsedwe.

error.title: Kuchotsa Kwalephera
error.message: Panali cholakwika pochotsa zokambirana. Chonde yesaninso.

fileUpload.uploadFiles: Kwezani mafayilo (mawu, kanema, kapena mawu olembedwa)
fileUpload.failedToOpenInEditor: Kulephera kutsegula fayilo mu wosintha nambala. Chonde yesaninso.

artifact.editsNotSaved: Zosintha sizinasungidwe. Tumizani mu uthenga kapena tsitsani kuti musunge zosintha zilizonse.
artifact.fileIncludedWithMessage: Fayilo ndi zosintha zaphatikizidwa mu uthenga

codeEditor.startTyping: Yambani kulemba kapena funsani AI kuti ipange nambala
codeEditor.codeWillSync: Nambala idzagwirizana modzidzimutsa kuchokera ku mauthenga a kucheza

dropdown.searchTooltip:
Yambitsani kusakira pa intaneti pa uthenga uliwonse.

Imapereka zambiri zaposachedwa pogwiritsa ntchito mwayi wa Bing pa intaneti nthawi yeniyeni.
dropdown.attachTooltip:
Matitsani mafayilo, zithunzi, kapena mawu/kanema.

Mitundu yothandizidwa:
• Zithunzi: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP (5MB mochuluka, mpaka 10)
• Zikalata: PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, TXT, MD (10MB mochuluka, mpaka 3)
• Deta: CSV, JSON, XML, YAML (10MB mochuluka, mpaka 3)
• Nambala: PY, JS, TS, JAVA, C, CPP, GO, ndi zina (10MB mochuluka, mpaka 3)
• Mawu/Kanema: MP3, WAV, MP4, WebM (25MB mochuluka, fayilo 1)

Zonse: mafayilo 10, 50MB mochuluka
dropdown.transcribeTooltip:
Kwezani mafayilo a mawu kapena kanema olemba.

Mitundu yothandizidwa: MP3, MP4, WAV, WebM, M4A, MPEG, MPGA
Kukula kwambiri: 25MB

Kulemba kumachitika modzidzimutsa mukatumiza uthenga.
dropdown.selectToneDescription: Sankhani mbiri ya mawu pa mauthenga anu
dropdown.translateDocumentTooltip:
Masulani zikalata ku chilankhulo china.

Mitundu yothandizidwa: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, HTML, TXT
Kukula kwambiri: 40MB

Imathandizira zilankhulo 80+ ndi mafayilo a mawu osankha.

transcription.maxDurationNote: Mafayilo akuluakulu atha kutenga mpaka mphindi {minutes}
transcription.timedOut: Kulemba kwatha nthawi pambuyo pa mphindi {minutes}
transcription.expiredOrDeleted: Zolemba izi zatha nthawi kapena zachotsedwa.
transcription.transcriptExpired: Zolemba za {filename} zatha nthawi. Zolemba zimachotsedwa modzidzimutsa pambuyo pa masiku {days} poteteza chinsinsi.
transcription.expirationWarning: Zolemba za {filename} zidzatha nthawi masiku {days}. Koperani zomwe zili ngati mukufuna kuzisunge.

documentTranslation.title: Kumasulira Zikalata
documentTranslation.glossaryHelp: Kwezani fayilo ya mawu ya CSV, TSV, kapena XLIFF ya mawu apadera.
documentTranslation.glossaryTooLarge: Fayilo ya mawu ndi yaikulu kwambiri. Kukula kwambiri ndi {maxSize}.
documentTranslation.documentTooLarge: Chikalata ndi chachikulu kwambiri. Kukula kwambiri ndi {maxSize}.
documentTranslation.documentNotFound: Chikalata chomasuliridwa sichinapezeke kapena chatha nthawi
documentTranslation.expired: Kumasulira kumeneku kwatha nthawi ndipo sikukupezekanso

customAgents.title: Ma-ejansi Apadera
customAgents.experimentalBlurb: Zoyesera - zopangidwa mogwirizana mwachindunji ndi ogwiritsa ntchito amphamvu a MSF. Osati ogwiritsidwa ntchito ndi aliyense.

privacy.policyTitle: Ndondomeko ya Chinsinsi ndi Kuteteza Deta
privacy.policyDescription: Phunzirani mmene deta yanu imatezekedwira ndi zambiri zomwe simuyenera kulowetsa
privacy.termsDescription: Onani malangizo ogwiritsira ntchito mwaudindo ndi ntchito zoletserwa
privacy.localStorage: Zokambirana zanu zimasungidwa pa chipangizo chanu
privacy.azureInfra: Kukonza deta konse kumachitika m'kati mwa dongosolo la MSF pogwiritsa ntchito Azure
privacy.noPersonalData: Musalowetse deta yaumwini (mayina, manambala a foni, ndi zina)
privacy.noSensitiveData: Musalowetse zambiri zoopsa kwambiri za ntchito
privacy.contactUs: Lumikizanani nafe nthawi yomweyo ngati muli ndi nkhawa za chinsinsi:

variableModal.fillInstructions: Dzazani zosinthika pansipa kuti musinthe lamulo lanu

chatInput.filePickerError: Sikunatheke kutsegula wosankha mafayilo. Yesani kugwiritsa ntchito kukoka ndi kugwetsa m'malo mwake.
